org.springframework.ldap.pool2.factory

Class MutablePooledContextSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.ldap.core.support.DelegatingBaseLdapPathContextSourceSupport
      • org.springframework.ldap.pool2.factory.PooledContextSource
        • org.springframework.ldap.pool2.factory.MutablePooledContextSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.DisposableBean, ContextSource, BaseLdapPathSource

    public class MutablePooledContextSource
extends PooledContextSource
    A PooledContextSource subclass that creates MutableDelegatingLdapContext instances. This enables the Spring LDAP pooling to be used in scenarios that require request controls to be set, such as paged results.
    Since:
    2.0
    Author:
    Anindya Chatterjee
